page.title: 18THE CHURCH AND THE CHAPEL
page.content: {St. Leonard's Church,}built in 1832, had its tower added later. It is in the diocese of{Lichfield. } When we asked the children we found that, out of 26, 10 families attend Sunday School, that 7 attend church every week and that 6 do not attend church at all. Because the{Roman Catholics}do not have a church in Woore, they have used St. Leonard's for their services. There used to be 2{Methodist}chapels in Woore, but one closed down and was made into Chapel Bakery. The other chapel, at the crossroads, was in danger of falling down, so it was all taken down except for the little schoolroom at the back. The{vicarage}is opposite the church, and, last year, the vicar of Woore had to become the vicar for St. Chad's at Norton-in-hales as well.
